com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util

Class AbstractConfigurationPropertyBuilder<P extends ConfigurationProperty,B extends AbstractConfigurationPropertyBuilder<P,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util.AbstractPropertyBuilder<ConfigurationProperty.Widget,P,B>
      • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util.AbstractConfigurationPropertyBuilder<P,B>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleConfigurationPropertyBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractConfigurationPropertyBuilder<P extends ConfigurationProperty,B extends AbstractConfigurationPropertyBuilder<P,B>>
extends AbstractPropertyBuilder<ConfigurationProperty.Widget,P,B>
    Abstract base class for configuration property builder implementations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      B addValidValues(String... validValues)
      Adds one or more valid values to the list of valid values for this configuration property.
      B configKey(String configKey)
      Sets the configuration key.
      B defaultErrorMessage(String defaultErrorMessage)
      Sets the default human-readable error message for when a required configuration property is missing, used when a localized error message cannot be found.
      B defaultPlaceholder(String defaultPlaceholder)
      Sets the default human-readable placeholder message when no value has been set for a configuration property, used when a localized placeholder message cannot be found.
      B defaultValue(String defaultValue)
      Sets the default value of the configuration property.
      String getConfigKey()
      Returns the configuration key.
      String getDefaultErrorMessage()
      Returns the default human-readable error message for when a required configuration property is missing, used when a localized error message cannot be found.

      Returns the default human-readable placeholder message of the configuration property, used when a localized placeholder cannot be found.

      Returns the default value of the configuration property.
      List<String> getValidValues()
      Returns the list of valid values for this configuration property.
      boolean isRequired()
      Returns whether the configuration property is required.
      B required(boolean required)
      Sets whether the configuration property is required.
      B validValues(List<String> validValues)
      Sets the list of valid values for this configuration property.
